mapper.insert: insert into SIGNUP_REQUEST (ID, MAIL_ADDR, TOKEN, APPLIED_AT, UPDATED_AT, CREATED_AT, LOCK_VERSION, DELETED_FLG) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mailAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{token,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{appliedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lockVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deletedFlg,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update SIGNUP_REQUEST set MAIL_ADDR = #{mailAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOKEN = #{token,jdbcType=CHAR}, APPLIED_AT = #{appliedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LOCK_VERSION = #{lockVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DELETED_FLG = #{deletedFlg,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, MAIL_ADDR, TOKEN, APPLIED_AT, UPDATED_AT, CREATED_AT, LOCK_VERSION, DELETED_FLG from SIGNUP_REQUEST
